scripts.version:config: replace 'version="\d+\.\d+\.\d+"' "version=\"$npm_package_version\"" ./config.xml && git add config.xml && git commit -m 'update config.xml'
scripts.release: grep version package.json | head -1 && npm version && git push && git push --tags
scripts.android: npm run android:build && npm run android:upload
scripts.android:device: NODE_ENV=production webpack && cordova build android && cordova run android
